name: Hover Ski Games
description:
Hover Games' is based in the San Francisco Bay in the Year 2077. "Black Eagle" will teach you how to Ride a Hover Ski and Fly a Starship on AutoPilot, In a Virtual Reality Enviroment. Hover Games' is in development mode and a Multi Player version  will be available soon. Please feel free to leave any suggestions' or comments'.

Unseenseven Games
